meyata shubhawadi kramawedaya wanne hakitharam durata sathwayange chiththa santhana buddhadi theruwanta yomu karawimata jagath kramawedayak athi kirimayi.yocha buddhancha dhammancha sanghancha saranangatho chaththari ariyasachchathi sammappanynyaya passathiaadi nayin deshana kala paridi buddhadi thunuruwan saranayama muladhara karagena sarana yannata kramayen sila samadhi, pragnya yana thriwidha shikshawan sampurna kirimen aaryamarga prathipadawen chathurarya sathya awabodha karagena uthum niwan suwayen sanasennata indura hakiwanne ya.theruwan sarana gos pas pawin walakena pudgalaya kramayen thriwidha shikshawen sowan margayata pilipan sathpurushayagen sidu nowana karana nawayak apa budurajanan wahanse dakwa wadala seka.shraddhawen theruwan sarana gos pragnyawen samma dittiyata path sathpurushaya sankhara dharmayan nithya sukha aathma washayen no balanneya.

me wage sewa laba ganimata janathawa yomu karawima ithama wadagath.eeta amatharawa game, nagaraye podu sanwardhana janatha awashyatha anuwa pramukhatha gatha karala, eewa kriyathmaka kirimata pradeshiya sanwardhana kamituweth anumathiyen katayuthu aarambha karannata puluwankama thibenawa.jangama sewaya sandaha paminena janathawata itha kramanukulawa, widhimathwa sewayak sapayannata nam eya aarambhaye sitama piliwelakata katayuthu yedawiya yuthuyi.

mahanuwara shikshana rohale hruda uras shalya eekakaye wisheshagnya shalya waidyawaru eeye (06) sita sathkam athulu siyalu prathikara anshawalin iwathwima nisa hruda sathkam sandaha poroththu lekhanaye sitina 6000k pamana wana hruda rogin ge jiwitha dadi anathurakata lakwa atha.shalyakarmawalata amatharawa sayana, rogin athulath kirima, athulu siyalu ansha adala thaththwaya hethuwen mulumaninma adapanawi atha.idiri dinawala pawathwena sayana sandaha nopaminena lesa rajaye waidya niladharinge sangamaye mahanuwara shikshana rohal shakhawa rohal adhyakshawariya magin roginta danum dimata piyawara gena thibe.wayambaa, madhyama, uthuru nagenahira, uuwa, uthurumada, sabaragamuwa yana palath hathenma rogin mahanuwara rohalata paminena athara, hruda roga anshayen dainikawa prathikara ganimata paminena rogin sankhyawa 400kata aasannaya.
ehidi miladi gath wi thoga gabada kirimata thawakalika gabada 15k miladi ganimata rajya sansthawak wetha rupiyal miliyana 39.33k gewa atha.

me sambandhayen adahas dakwana dilshange hitapu birinda nilanka withanage mahathmiya prakasha kale dilshan kisidu dinaka laksha 300k gewa nathi bawath,dikkasada wandiya lesa thamata laksha 80ka niwasak ha parana motar rathayak pamanak laba dun bawath,nadaththu naduwata adala masakata ru.20,000k pamanak gewana bawathya.pasugiya wasara 9purawata dilshan siya daruwa samaga katha kirimata ho awadhanayak yomu nokala bawa pawasana aya dilshan wisin pasugiya masa hatharata adalawa (20,000*4) nadaththu mudal nisi lesa nogewima matha thamata usawi yamata sidu wu bawath kiya siti.esema nadu dinaya manga harima nithignyayanta amathakawimak lesa dilshan prakasha kalath ema dinaya prakasha karana lada awasthawe di dilshan,dilshan ge piya menma, nithignyayanda usawiye siti bawada emanisa eya gothana lada kathawak bawath prakasha karayi.
